correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and not traceable to the article, with a schema violation. Key issues: (1) Schema violation: processParameters.plasmaPower is set to null, but if present must be an object or omitted; PEALD is not used, so this field should be removed. (2) Supercycle misuse: supercycleDesign lists IGZO/HfOx/IZO as a subcycle sequence and assigns subcycle counts; the paper does not report any IGZO supercycle (In/Ga/Zn subcycles) or subcycle ratios. (3) Invented process values not in the article: pressure (0.1 mTorr), dosing/purge times (100 ms), flow rates (sccm values), nucleationPeriod (5 cycles), saturation (True), growth-per-cycle values and number of cycles, and reactant carrier/purging gases are all absent from the text. (4) Reactants: O3 as co-reactant is correct, but all precursors are marked "Not specified" and other gas fields are placeholders, not traceable to the article. (5) Material properties are fabricated: optical (n, band gap), electrical (resistivity, Hall mobility, carrier density), uniformity, conformality, roughness, density, and film composition/atomic ratios (e.g., 1.0:2.8:5.4) are not reported; the article only shows EDS mapping for In/Ga/Zn/O without quantification. (6) Device properties: SS = 86 mV/dec matches the average for 8 nm IZO interlayer, but thresholdVoltage is wrong (reported around -0.06 V; extraction uses -1.0 V), fieldEffectMobility and onOffRatio are not reported in the article, and thus ungrounded. (7) Film thickness handling is inconsistent with the multilayer stack: only IGZO 6 nm is listed in filmThickness while the paper also deposits 10 nm HfOx and 20 nm IZO; the extraction mixes multiple films under one process without clear separation. Properties to correct/review: remove plasmaPower or make it compliant; delete or justify supercycleDesign; remove all unreported dosing/purge/flow/pressure/GPC/cycle counts/uniformity/conformality/optical/electrical/composition/roughness/density values; correct thresholdVoltage to the reported value; clearly scope filmThickness per layer or separate processes for IZO interlayer, IGZO channel, HfOx, and IZO gate; retain only O3 oxidant and 250 °C which are supported.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incorrect and not traceable to the article, with multiple schema issues and many fabricated values. Key problems: (1) Many parameters are invented and not reported in the paper: reactor details, pressure (0.1 mTorr), growth-per-cycle values for IGZO/HfOx/IZO, number of cycles (10), dosing/purge times (100 ms), flow rates, saturation, nucleation period, uniformity (5%), conformality aspect ratio (10), optical properties (n, bandgap), film-level electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), XPS composition and atomic ratios, roughness, density, on/off ratio. None are traceable. (2) Schema misuse/violations: plasmaPower is set to None (type mismatch; should be omitted since TALD), and supercycleDesign is incorrectly defined across different materials (IGZO/HfOx/IZO); the article does not describe an IGZO supercycle or any supercycle at all. (3) Critical reported details are missing or wrong: interlayer (IZO) thicknesses of 3, 5, and 8 nm are central but not captured; reported film thicknesses 6 nm (IGZO), 10 nm (HfOx), and 20 nm (IZO gate) are only partially included (only 6 nm appears); O3 as oxidant and 250 °C are correctly captured. (4) Device properties are incorrect: thresholdVoltage is set to −1.0 V (the article reports ≈ −0.06 V for 8 nm interlayer; other values are given for 3 and 5 nm), SS ~ 86 mV/dec is fine, but on/off ratio and field-effect mobility are not reported. (5) Multiplicity: the article reports devices with three different interlayer thicknesses; the extraction provides only a single process and does not represent these variants. Properties to add/review: remove fabricated dosing/purge/flow/pressure/GPC/optical/electrical/composition/roughness/density unless sourced; correct thresholdVoltage to reported values; include interlayer thickness variants (3, 5, 8 nm) and layer thicknesses (6 nm IGZO, 10 nm HfOx, 20 nm IZO gate); remove or correct supercycleDesign; omit plasmaPower; ensure all values are traceable to the article.
